goals__remit: Sarasin & Partners is an independent investment manager of long-term global assets on behalf of pension funds, charities, public and private investors.  Our goal is to deliver enduring performance for our clients through responsible stewardship.  A key aspect of this is seeking to influence policies in a way which will improve the operation and performance of markets in a way which is aligned with sustainable economic growth.
